CustomField.formula: IF ( DMAPP__Opportunity__r.IsClosed || DMAPP__Is_Dealmaker_Opp__c = false , IF ( DMAPP__Opportunity__r.IsWon || DMAPP__Is_Dealmaker_Opp__c = false, DMAPP__Opportunity__r.CloseDate, null ), IF ( NULLVALUE (DMAPP__Pause_Date__c, DATEVALUE(NOW())) > DATEVALUE(NOW()), DMAPP__Pause_Date__c + (NULLVALUE(DMAPP__Weeks_To_Close__c, 0) * 7), DATEVALUE(NOW()) + (NULLVALUE(DMAPP__Weeks_To_Close__c, 0) * 7) ) )
CustomField.label: Qualification Calculated Close Date
